title: Smart Data Models - GovSteam2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simplified governor model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteam2

dbf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency dead band (DBF).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor gain (reciprocal of droop) (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

mnef.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel flow maximum negative error value (MN).  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0

mxef.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel flow maximum positive error value (MX).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum fuel flow (P).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum fuel flow (P).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lag time constant (T) (>0).  Typical Value = 0.45. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lead time constant (T) (may be 0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0
